title: Introduction to Computer Science Education Utilizing Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Structured experimental (Closed Lab) environments for enhancing job application competencies of current practitioners, with mandatory collaborative sessions to deepen course content and link to practical projects

learning_goals: Learners can explain algorithm design and problem-solving processes through collaboration with peers.
Learners can implement small-scale applications using Python or Java through team-based projects.
Learners can improve teammates' code quality by applying code review and pair programming techniques.

resources: Access to Collaboration Tools (Slack, GitHub, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
